original_text:
For death has come up into our windows;
    it has entered our palaces,
cutting off the children from the streets
    and the young men from the squares.
korean_text: 무릇 사망이 우리 창문을 통하여 넘어 들어오며 우리 궁실에 들어오며 밖에서는 자녀들을 거리에서는 청년들을 멸절하려 하느니라

sentences.original_text: For death has come up into our windows
cutting off the children from the streets
and the young men from the squares.
